com.camerontec.util.logger.slf4j

Class Slf4jLoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.logger.slf4j.Slf4jLoggerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoggerFactory

    public final class Slf4jLoggerFactory
extends Object
implements ILoggerFactory
    Logger factory implementation for producing and caching SLF4J logger instances and their adapters.

        This is an optional operation and need only be implemented when it makes sense.

      • getLogger

        public ILogger getLogger(Class<?> className)
        Description copied from interface: ILoggerFactory
        Return a named logger, creating one if required.
        Specified by:
        getLogger in interface ILoggerFactory
        Parameters:
        className - The class name on which to base the logger name.
        Returns:
